segments.text: Does your girl friend like swimming ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , she does . She is good at backstroke and free style .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then you can help her with the breaststroke and sidestroke .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But she wants to learn the butterfly stroke
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Then just ask her to follow me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I heard you are now practicing underwater swimming , aren't you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . But I still have some difficulties it breathing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Say , kid , keep on practicing , you're sure to be a first-class swimmer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: To tell you the truth , I have never thought of being a swimmer . I swim just for fun .
segments.speaker: S1
